Text: You are a gentleman and a scholar! Thank you for fulfilling a request!

Hi I've been following you for a while, thanks for your work it is really useful

I have a request: "The Zeroes: My Misadventures in the Decade Wall Street Went Insane
by Randall Lane"

and

"The First Wall Street: Chestnut Street, Philadelphia, and the Birth of American Finance
by Robert E. Wright"

Thanks
